thread.section_title: tyresonthedrive.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of tyresonthedrive.com | tyresonthedrive.com | 49 of 1961
thread.title: Matt Roberts

author: Matt Roberts
title: Matt Roberts
text:
Great service, only had one tyre fitted and wasn't treated any less important, fitter (earl) phoned half hour before arrival, turned up on time within the time slot, polite, efficient and quality service provided. No problems. Would use again, would rather wait at home than in a grubby garage waiting room watching tyre fitters work on everyone else's car but mine !
Thought I didn't receive emails but they had gone in my junk mail !
